title: Lakshmi Bandhi: Ruby & Diamond Floral Cuff Bangle
materials: featuring a central Ruby gemstone and brilliant-cut Diamonds (VS clarity
features: This exquisite cuff bangle showcases a delicate floral design inspired by traditional South Indian motifs. The central Ruby is bezel-set, surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds. The intricate openwork lattice detailing adds a touch of modern elegance while preserving the classic charm of Telugu craftsmanship.
colors: Radiant yellow gold with a vibrant red Ruby centerpiece
complemented by the dazzling white sparkle of diamonds.
occasions: festive occasions like Sankranti and Diwali
or for adding a touch of regal elegance to a cocktail party. Suitable for brides
or as a treasured heirloom piece.
description: Crafted with the finest materials and impeccable Hyderabadi artistry, this bangle represents a harmonious blend of tradition and contemporary style. The vibrant Ruby symbolizes prosperity and passion, while the diamonds signify purity and brilliance. Its unique design makes it a statement piece that will be cherished for generations.
